title: Add gwi issues command
description: Full GitHub Issues integration: create, list, assign, close issues. AI-powered issue triage and routing.

title: Implement Reviewer Agent
description: Claude Sonnet agent for validating resolutions. Syntax check, code loss detection, security scan.

title: Add gwi diff command
description: Show proposed resolution diff for a PR. Fetches cached resolution from AgentFS and displays colored diff.

title: Implement Resolver Agent
description: Claude Sonnet/Opus agent for merge conflict resolution. Must be stateful (AgentFS), handle single-file conflicts, generate explanations.

title: Implement Orchestrator Agent
description: Central coordinator that routes work between agents. Manages workflow state, handles escalations, tracks agent health. Uses Gemini Flash for routing decisions.

title: Deploy to GCP Cloud Run
description: Deploy gwi API to Cloud Run with Vertex AI Agent Engine integration. Set up service accounts, IAM, Cloud Build.

title: Install dependencies and verify build
description: Run npm install, npm run build, verify TypeScript compiles

title: Update CLI resolve command
description: Wire up full pipeline: Triage -> Resolver -> Reviewer -> Human approval

title: Implement Coder Agent
description: Phase 2: Issue-to-Code agent. Takes issue description, generates implementation plan, writes code. Uses Claude Opus for complex tasks.

title: Add gwi apply command
description: Apply approved resolution to branch. Commits changes, pushes to remote, updates PR.

title: Add gwi logs command
description: View agent logs and audit trail from AgentFS. Filter by agent, time range, tool name.
